page.title: 11EDUCATION IN TARBERT,HARRIS
page.content: Sir E Scott School in Tarbert consists of a primary department(age 5-12)and a secondary department(age 12-16).There are 74 pupils in the primary dept.and 134 pupils in the secondary dept.The secondary school is the only 4 year secondary school in Harris.Pupils study to"O"Grade level.If they wish to remain at school after 16 they must go to Stornoway.They go to school on a Monday morning and board in town until Friday when they return home to Harris. Because so many pupils travel a distance to school(up to 26miles each way,daily)the school day begins at 9.30am.After school activities are limited and many have to take place in school time,eg.football matches.The only provision for pre-school children in Tarbert is a local playgroup.
